content.rendered:
Cordelia Cruises Kochi to Mumbai

Home » Cordelia Cruise » Cordelia Cruises Kochi to Mumbai

Tour Overview

Life is so hectic nowadays that we all look for some good breaks or vacations to recharge our souls now and then, and what could be better than a cruise holiday? An experience far from the hustle and bustle of the city, in a place where you could see only water and sky all around you, and that’s so damn peaceful. Hop on for an unforgettable cruise holiday from Kochi to Mumbai with the Cordelia cruise, and enjoy the luxury of a cruise, with the never-ending mesmerizing views and a lot of fun and entertainment.

This 3-day journey is going to fill you with joy, as you can enjoy the best of both worlds on this vacation. Where you can spend some time with yourself in the reading room on board, you can have a lovely time with your friends and family in the evening with our splendid parties on the cruise. You can witness super entertaining performances in the theatre and also enjoy the lavish amenities like the swimming pool, spa centre, and casino. The rooms on the cruise a super comfortable. Book your cruise holiday now and we are sure this is going to be one of the most memorable trips of your life.

Cordelia Cruises Kochi to Mumbai Tour Itinerary

Day 1 :Board from Kochi

Embark on your cruise journey from the Kochi port, and make sure you reach on time for boarding. Check-in your room, spend some time there, and get comfortable. Experience different activities on the cruise the entire day, from the casino to the swimming pool, and enjoy the delicious food at the food court.

Day 2 :The Sailing Day

Begin your day with a tempting breakfast with a beautiful view. Spend some time in the pool or get a relaxing spa done. Let your kids enjoy the kid’s area, and also spend some quality time with them, by playing games. Try different restaurants on the cruise, the food overall is super delicious. Since the restaurant serves both Indian and International cuisine, one must try it all.

Head to the nightclubs in the evening, grab your drinks and enjoy the good music, party the entire night, and have fun. If you wish to try your luck, do visit the casino and do some adventure out there. Do not forget to enjoy the dance and musical performances at the theatre.

Day 3 :Reach Mumbai

Take the bundle of your cruise trip memories and get down at the Mumbai port. Spend time in the city of dreams, enjoy good food and beautiful beaches, and do click a lot of pictures.

Price Details

Tour Name Cordelia Cruises Kochi to Mumbai
Duration 3 Days / 2 Nights
Destinations Kochi - Mumbai
Tour Price On Request

Chat with specialist who can help plan your tour!

  • +91-971 1616 316

    Holiday Your Way with Namaste India Trip!

    Filling out the information form provided allows you to receive the best budget-friendly customized itinerary in just a few hours.

    • We assure the privacy of your contact data.

    • This data will only be used by our team to contact you and no other purposes.

    Trip Highlights

    • A trip is never complete without good food, and Cordelia Cruise never disappoints you with their food. The food courts and the restaurants on the ship serve mouth-watering national and international delicacies.
    • If you are looking for a calming and relaxing holiday, you can have a soothing spa session on the cruise.
    • For party lovers, there are a lot of bars and lounges on the cruise. The nightlife on the cruise is something that you just cannot miss.
    • You will never feel bored on the cruise even for a second, as the Cordelia cruise is the powerhouse of entertainment, you get to witness a lot of live shows in the theatre, including dance and music performances and magical shows.
    • If you are coming along with your kids, they are going to love the fun-filled kid’s play area. Also, if you want to spend some quality time with your loved ones, there is a game zone for adults where you can play some board games and video games with your friends and family.
    • You must try your luck at the casino on the cruise, it’s a wonderful way to spend your evening.
    • For those who seek peace, and love to read on a holiday, we also have a separate reading room with a mesmerizing view of the sea. One can grab a drink and enjoy reading their book.

    Package Inclusions

    • The package includes your stay and all three of your meals, breakfast, lunch and dinner.
    • It includes your access to amenities like a swimming pool, lounges, etc.
    • It allows you to use all the public access areas on the cruise and also includes entertaining performances at the theatre.

    Package Exclusions

    • The package doesn’t include your travel to the boarding destination, i.e., Kochi Port, in case you are coming from some other city.
    • The package doesn’t include any alcoholic beverages.

    FAQs for Cordelia Cruises Kochi to Mumbai

    Q. Is There Any Medical Certificate Required To Go On A Cruise Holiday?

    A. Any medical certificate is not required, but it is important to highlight any major medical condition before you board the cruise. Pregnant women and infants (0-6 months) are not allowed to board the cruise.

    Q. Can We Carry Our Beverages On The Cruises?

    A. Guests are not allowed to carry any alcoholic beverages on the cruise, you can only drink the alcohol that is served in the bars on the cruise.

    Q. Do We Need To Carry A Passport To Travel On A Cruise?

    A. If you are traveling internationally from a cruise, then you need to carry a passport, however, for a national trip, any photo ID would work.

    Q. What Is The Cancellation Policy?

    A. If you book a trip and cancel before 15 days of the date of the journey, you get a refund of 50%, however, if you cancel when less than 15 days are left for the journey, you get a 0% refund, which means all your booking amount will be charged as a cancellation fee.

    Q. How Long Does It Take To Process The Refund?

    A. They usually take 7-10 days to refund the money to the source. You can also contact Customer support to get clarity on this.
